attributes.additional_details:
Carr House Rescue Centre is based in Hull, and saves dogs and keeps them fed, watered and safe until they are rehomed.

Due to recent cuts, the centre has lost its funding. This means that if the digs are not rehomed by April 5th, this year, then the dogs will simply be put down.

That's right; our government would rather spend millions keeping alive child killers, paedophiles, terrorists and other serious offenders in prison, than keep alive I innocent dogs that have done nothing wrong.

Where's the justice in that?

Please sign the petition!
